sections.name: Overview
content: Minecraft client_biome files define client-side settings for biomes in resource packs.
This is the new preferred location for per-biome settings that used to be in biomes_client.json.

(As of base game version 1.21.40, biomes_client.json is no longer loaded from built-in Vanilla resource packs. That file will still be loaded for other content regardless of version, and worlds using older base game versions will also still use it.)
These files are not part of the 'Custom Biomes' experiment and do not cause biome definitions to exist on their own, but they can be used to customize client-side settings of custom biomes.

sections.name: JSON Format
content: Here is a sample client_biome file.
"format_version": "1.21.40",
"minecraft:client_biome": {
"description": {
"identifier": "the_end"
"components": {
"minecraft:sky_color": {
"minecraft:fog_appearance": {
"fog_identifier": "minecraft:fog_the_end"
"minecraft:water_appearance": {
"surface_color": "#62529e"

sections.name: Client Biome Components
content: Any components that this Client Biome uses

rows.Name: minecraft:ambient_sounds
rows.Description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

rows.Name: minecraft:atmosphere_identifier
rows.Description: [INTERNAL - WORK IN PROGRESS] Set the atmosphere settings used during deferred rendering. Biomes without this component will have default atmosphere settings.

rows.Name: minecraft:biome_music
rows.Description: Affect how music plays within the biome

rows.Name: minecraft:color_grading_identifier
rows.Description: [INTERNAL - WORK IN PROGRESS] Set the color_grading settings used during deferred rendering. Biomes without this component will have default color_grading settings.

rows.Name: minecraft:dry_foliage_color
rows.Description: Set the dry foliage color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default dry foliage color behavior.

rows.Name: minecraft:fog_appearance
rows.Description: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

rows.Name: minecraft:foliage_appearance
rows.Description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

rows.Name: minecraft:grass_appearance
rows.Description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

rows.Name: minecraft:lighting_identifier
rows.Description: [INTERNAL - WORK IN PROGRESS] Set the lighting settings used during deferred rendering. Biomes without this component will have default lighting settings.

rows.Name: minecraft:sky_color
rows.Description: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.

rows.Name: minecraft:water_appearance
rows.Description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

rows.Name: minecraft:water_identifier
rows.Description: [INTERNAL - WORK IN PROGRESS] Set the water settings used during deferred rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water settings.

sections.name: Client Biome Definition
content: Contains a description and components to define a Client Biome.

rows.Name: components
rows.Type: Object of type Client Biome Components
rows.Description: Components for this Client Biome.

rows.Name: description
rows.Type: Object of type Client Biome Description
rows.Description: Non-component settings, including the Client Biome name.

sections.name: Client Biome Description
content: Contains non-component settings for a Client Biome.

rows.Name: identifier
rows.Description: The name of the Client Biome, used by other features like the '/locate biome' command. Must match the name of a Biome defined by the game or a behavior pack.

sections.name: Client Biome JSON File
content: Contains a format version and a Client Biome definition

rows.Name: format_version
rows.Description: Version of the JSON schema used by this file

rows.Name: minecraft:client_biome
rows.Type: Object of type Client Biome Definition
rows.Description: A single Client Biome definition, containing rendering or sound settings related to a Biome defined by the game or a behavior pack

sections.name: Foliage Color Map
content: Object specifying a color map for foliage instead of a specific color.

rows.Name: color_map
rows.Description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of foliage.

sections.name: Grass Color Map
content: Object specifying a color map for grass instead of a specific color.

rows.Name: color_map
rows.Description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of grass.

sections.name: minecraft:ambient_sounds
content: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

rows.Name: addition
rows.Description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position

rows.Name: loop
rows.Description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome

rows.Name: mood
rows.Description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby air block position when the light level is low. Biomes without an ambient mood sound will use the 'ambient.cave' sound.

sections.name: minecraft:atmosphere_identifier
content: [INTERNAL - WORK IN PROGRESS] Set the atmosphere settings used during deferred rendering. Biomes without this component will have default atmosphere settings.

rows.Name: atmosphere_identifier
rows.Description: Identifier of atmosphere definition to use

sections.name: minecraft:biome_music
content: Affect how music plays within the biome

rows.Name: volume_multiplier
rows.Description: Multiplier temporarily and gradually applied to music volume when within this biome. Must be a value between 0 and 1, inclusive.

sections.name: minecraft:color_grading_identifier
content: [INTERNAL - WORK IN PROGRESS] Set the color_grading settings used during deferred rendering. Biomes without this component will have default color_grading settings.

rows.Name: color_grading_identifier
rows.Description: Identifier of color_grading definition to use

sections.name: minecraft:dry_foliage_color
content: Set the dry foliage color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default dry foliage color behavior.

rows.Name: color
rows.Description: RGB color of dry foliage

sections.name: minecraft:fog_appearance
content: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

rows.Name: fog_identifier
rows.Description: Identifier of fog definition to use

sections.name: minecraft:foliage_appearance
content: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

rows.Name: color
rows.Type: Object of type Color255RGB or Object of type Foliage Color Map
rows.Description: RGB color of foliage, or a Foliage Color Map object.

sections.name: minecraft:grass_appearance
content: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

rows.Name: color
rows.Type: Object of type Color255RGB or Object of type Grass Color Map
rows.Description: RGB color of grass.

sections.name: minecraft:lighting_identifier
content: [INTERNAL - WORK IN PROGRESS] Set the lighting settings used during deferred rendering. Biomes without this component will have default lighting settings.

rows.Name: lighting_identifier
rows.Description: Identifier of lighting definition to use

sections.name: minecraft:sky_color
content: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.

rows.Name: sky_color
rows.Description: RGB color of the sky

sections.name: minecraft:water_appearance
content: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

rows.Name: surface_color
rows.Description: RGB color of the water surface

rows.Name: surface_opacity
rows.Description: Opacity of the water surface (must be between 0 for invisible and 1 for opaque, inclusive)

sections.name: minecraft:water_identifier
content: [INTERNAL - WORK IN PROGRESS] Set the water settings used during deferred rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water settings.

rows.Name: water_identifier
rows.Description: Identifier of water definition to use
